Data type: Definitions of field names and abbreviations

Annual Demographic Estimates : Subprovin: not available for a specific reference period
Crown colony / Colonie de la couronne
Subdivision of county municipality / Subdivision municipalité de comté
Subdivision of unorganized / Subdivision non organisée
Population estimates as of July 1 are final intercensal up to 2015, final postcensal for 2016 to 2018, updated postcensal for 2019 and preliminary postcensal for 2020.
We did not include GEO_Level2, which classifies  census subdivisions according to whether they have 5,000-plus populations or populations under 5,000.  This can be deduced from the presented data.
